messages.message:
1 => Two entirely separate tables, like search projects

2 => Good question; what do you think?

Btw, not planning to make any changes soon. Just wanted to get a temperature check!

1 => Sounds good!
2 => I think we can keep the changes separate initially, first the DB change can go in, keeping endpoints the same just handling the switch in the accessor layer. Then, converse and build can implement any new endpoints & keep using the existing ones until then.
